text: Joan S Crosby (née Brock) was a female English international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== She won double silver at the 1949 World Table Tennis Championships in the women's team event and the women's doubles with Pinkie Barnes. ==Personal life== She married Donald Crosby in 1940. ==See also== * List of England players at the World Team Table Tennis Championships * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:English female table tennis players Category:1920 births Category:Possibly living people Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Joan Crosby
